Title: Good Night, and Good Luck.
Overview: The story of journalist Edward R. Murrow's stand against Senator Joseph McCarthy's anti-communist witch-hunts in the early 1950s.
Tagline: We will not walk in fear of one another.
production_companies: 2929 Productions, Participant Productions, Warner Independent Pictures (WIP), Davis Films, Section Eight Productions, Redbus Pictures, Tohokushinsha
Cast: David Strathairn, Jeff Daniels, Alex Borstein
clean_text: good night good luck story journalist edward r murrows stand senator joseph mccarthys anticommunist witchhunt early 1950 walk fear one drama history george clooney david strathairn jeff daniels alex borstein 2005
